game.name: Tiny Aquarium: Social Fishkeeping
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, MMO, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 물고기 덕후들 모여라! 이 방치형 물고기 키우기 시뮬레이션 게임은 오프라인에서도 물고기가 자라요. 물고기를 키우고, 낚시하고, 판매하고, 어항을 꾸미며 친구의 수조를 방문해 소통하거나 함께 바다로 나가 낚시도 즐길 수 있어요! 지금 바로 꿈같은 데스크탑 어항 세계에 입장해보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A happy aquarium that lives at the bottom of your screen! Tiny Aquarium is a social idle simulator that keeps growing, even when offline. Hatch, sell fish, decorate, go fishin’, and visit your friends’ aquariums with bite-sized daily sessions.

reviewHighlights.text: instantly fell in love with this game. so relaxing. it reminds me a lot of an aquarium game that i used to play on my mom's facebook as a child.
